item.description:
Hi ladies,

 

I know we just had our last meet up at Sake but it looks like people are interested in hitting this venue again so why not, right?  As always, I ask that you let me know if you are not going to be able to make it prior to the event date.  I have to make reservations with the EXACT number of guests for this restaurant in order to get seated at a Hibachi table.

Oh, in addition, if you haven't paid the annual $5.00 dues, please do so if you plan to attend:-)

See you all soon!!!!

 

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: When the date nears, I will send out an email letting people know how to find us (although the lobby isn't very large so you probably can't miss us:-)
item.why: It looks like people are interested in heading to Sake....so......let's do it!!
item.name: Sushi and Hibachi at Sake
